You get on the island with the ferry from
. Travel time is 12 minutes, a return ticket for adults costs 45 DKK(~6 EUR). A ticket for a small car in the tourist season costs 415 DKK(~56 EUR). Schedules available at

(select the route "Esbjerg - Fanø"). The ferry arrives at the city of Nordby.

Travelers arriving by train in Esbjerg can take the bus line #5 from the main station to the Fanø ferry port. The ride takes aprox. 10 minutes and costs 20 DKK (~3 EUR) for adults.
The most convenient way to travel on the island is by car or bicycle. There is a bus line going from Nordby to Sønderho.
The beach, the town of Nordby, the town of Sønderho.
Rent a house (for example through http://www.feriefanoe.dk or http://www.danibo.dk), stay at the Vesterhavet hotel or at the Fanø Badeland hotel.
Take the ferry, return rides are free (you have paid for it when you bought your ticket in Esbjerg).
